content.text: Match ends, Napoli 5, Club Brugge 0.
Second Half ends, Napoli 5, Club Brugge 0.
Attempt saved. Lorenzo Insigne (Napoli) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner.
Timmy Simons (Club Brugge) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
José Callejón (Napoli) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Timmy Simons (Club Brugge).
Attempt missed. José Callejón (Napoli) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Lorenzo Insigne with a through ball.
Offside, Club Brugge. Ruud Vormer tries a through ball, but Leandro Pereira is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Ruud Vormer (Club Brugge) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Claudemir.
Leandro Pereira (Club Brugge) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Kalidou Koulibaly (Napoli).
José Callejón (Napoli) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Claudemir (Club Brugge).
Goal!  Napoli 5, Club Brugge 0. José Callejón (Napoli) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Allan with a through ball.
Offside, Napoli. Kalidou Koulibaly tries a through ball, but Faouzi Ghoulam is caught offside.
Substitution, Napoli. Lorenzo Insigne replaces Dries Mertens.
Offside, Napoli. Kalidou Koulibaly tries a through ball, but José Callejón is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Davy de Fauw (Club Brugge) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right.
Substitution, Napoli. Manolo Gabbiadini replaces Gonzalo Higuaín.
Faouzi Ghoulam (Napoli) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Thomas Meunier (Club Brugge).
Gonzalo Higuaín (Napoli) hits the left post with a left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box.
Substitution, Club Brugge. Davy de Fauw replaces Víctor Vázquez.
Attempt missed. Kalidou Koulibaly (Napoli) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high following a corner.
Corner,  Napoli. Conceded by Brandon Mechele.
Attempt blocked. Gonzalo Higuaín (Napoli) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by José Callejón.
Corner,  Napoli. Conceded by Brandon Mechele.
Substitution, Napoli. Allan replaces Marek Hamsik.
Foul by Claudemir (Club Brugge).
David López (Napoli) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Raúl Albiol (Napoli) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Leandro Pereira (Club Brugge).
Substitution, Club Brugge. Claudemir replaces Abdoulaye Diaby.
Foul by David López (Napoli).
José Heriberto Izquierdo (Club Brugge) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Napoli. Conceded by Sinan Bolat.
Attempt saved. Dries Mertens (Napoli) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Marek Hamsik.
Jorginho (Napoli) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Abdoulaye Diaby (Club Brugge).
Foul by Leandro Pereira (Club Brugge).
Raúl Albiol (Napoli) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt blocked. Gonzalo Higuaín (Napoli) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Elseid Hysaj.
Timmy Simons (Club Brugge) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Gonzalo Higuaín (Napoli).
Corner,  Napoli. Conceded by Óscar Duarte.
Attempt blocked. Dries Mertens (Napoli) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is blocked. Assisted by Faouzi Ghoulam.
Goal!  Napoli 4, Club Brugge 0. Marek Hamsik (Napoli) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box to the centre of the goal.
Leandro Pereira (Club Brugge) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jorginho (Napoli).
Second Half begins Napoli 3, Club Brugge 0.
Substitution, Club Brugge. José Heriberto Izquierdo replaces Boli Bolingoli Mbombo.
First Half ends, Napoli 3, Club Brugge 0.
Attempt missed. Faouzi Ghoulam (Napoli) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Marek Hamsik.
Corner,  Napoli. Conceded by Brandon Mechele.
Attempt blocked. Gonzalo Higuaín (Napoli) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Dries Mertens.
Attempt missed. José Callejón (Napoli) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left.
Attempt missed. David López (Napoli) left footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Gonzalo Higuaín.
Attempt missed. Dries Mertens (Napoli) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Gonzalo Higuaín.
Offside, Club Brugge. Sinan Bolat tries a through ball, but Abdoulaye Diaby is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Óscar Duarte (Club Brugge) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal.
Corner,  Club Brugge. Conceded by Kalidou Koulibaly.
Attempt saved. Óscar Duarte (Club Brugge) header from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Víctor Vázquez.
Abdoulaye Diaby (Club Brugge) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Faouzi Ghoulam (Napoli).
Goal!  Napoli 3, Club Brugge 0. Dries Mertens (Napoli) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Jorginho following a set piece situation.
Jorginho (Napoli) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Víctor Vázquez (Club Brugge).
Attempt saved. Víctor Vázquez (Club Brugge) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Timmy Simons.
Attempt saved. Dries Mertens (Napoli) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Marek Hamsik.
Attempt missed. Marek Hamsik (Napoli) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left.
Attempt missed. Abdoulaye Diaby (Club Brugge) left footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the left.
Goal!  Napoli 2, Club Brugge 0. Dries Mertens (Napoli) left footed shot from very close range to the bottom left corner. Assisted by José Callejón with a cross.
Offside, Club Brugge. Thomas Meunier tries a through ball, but Víctor Vázquez is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Víctor Vázquez (Club Brugge) right footed shot from more than 35 yards is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Abdoulaye Diaby.
Offside, Napoli. Kalidou Koulibaly tries a through ball, but José Callejón is caught offside.
Goal!  Napoli 1, Club Brugge 0. José Callejón (Napoli) right footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the right to the top left corner. Assisted by Jorginho.
Raúl Albiol (Napoli) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Leandro Pereira (Club Brugge).
First Half begins.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
